turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how may i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order some a espresso from Starbucks, a tall espresso, with whole milk and two sugars.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm not sure if i got all that information.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I want to order an espresso with whole milk and two sugars.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. so a tall espresso with whole milk and 2 sugars from starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which starbucks did you want to place this order at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. the total will be $4.00.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to purchase now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order has been placed. it'll be ready for pick up in 8 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, appreciate that. Thank you very much.
